title: The only editing app you will need!!
text: I love cap cut more than any of my editing apps!! It‚Äôs so easy to make edits of my favorite shows,my friends,family,dogs,movies and etc.. I could spend hours just scrolling through. Why I love this app so much is because it already has templates to make your edits and it feels like you made a masterpiece after making it!! Cap cut has a tutorial section where they show you how to edit better, so if you wanted to edit a video or make a edit then you can go to the tutorial part and it will show exactly how to use it. Overall the app in my opinion has no flaws and is my favorite thing to do on my device!!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND ‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è

title: I love CapCut!
text: CapCut is an app where you can create videos, make animations, edits, Even more! To me, this app is incredible because it helps me understand how to work a video and make all sorts of Cool Video‚Äôs, I‚Äôve been wanting to become a GachaTuber for so long, without CapCut I wouldn‚Äôt be able to over come that dream of mine, I‚Äôm finally making video‚Äôs whenever I want to, Loving it. In CapCut, you can Explore all these new designs, try new things, Filters, Overlays, Adjustment, Editing, The one I like most is the adjusting part, because you can put things slow motion, faster, get rid of things you don‚Äôt want into the video, etc. this is really an Amazing app and I strongly suggest you get CapCut for free!

title: Was A Good App
text: Capcut was a VERY good app. You could do many things for free like effects, transitions, etc. A lot of people used the app because it was free and easier to use. The new update came around and they made things cost money and took out a bunch of things. Let‚Äôs take effect for example. Last update you didn‚Äôt have to search for 30 minutes to find one effect because of the new update. They also took out the best effects making it so much worse to people. They also made ‚Äúpro‚Äù effects which are not very useful. The ‚Äúpro‚Äù effects, transitions and animations literally are such a rip off to buy. Capcut only had a fan base or people using it because it was FULLY FREE but because they took things out and made it money they are going to lose most of their user base. Bring back the capcut that was free and that had all the good effects.

title: Hello, I love your editing software, just a few comments / suggestions
text:
Hi! Im Dan, I‚Äôve been using CapCut as my editing software for a couple months and I‚Äôve even=n used it for some school projects! I love your app, I love the fact that you can edit sounds, add text, do voiceovers, and the fact that it is free and easy to use! However, I do have some simple suggestions. 

1. The spaces when you put apostrophes are to long, it looks as if there are a couple spaces between the characters whenever an apostrophe is added.
2. Sometimes, the background of a photo isn‚Äôt a png whenever you try to make it a png, and blends in with the object you‚Äôre trying to keep (EX: Like an emoji blending in with the background and some of the emoji falling out or some of the background blending in with the emoji and not getting removed.)
3. Sometimes, the voiceovers aren‚Äôt able to be slowed down and sometimes you can‚Äôt hear them. This is really rare though and has only happened one time.

I love your app and I love almost everything in it. However, i think these suggestions need to be added in game. Thanks!

title: Used to be good, now issues with centering and sizing
text: I‚Äôve tried out CapCut for a while now and it was okay. Until an update came and screwed up the centering and sizing thing. If I try to move it after the overlay was added, the thing on the main track moves out of the centering and I have to do the centering all over again. Not to mention the sizing messed up as well, when the blue bar on the side of the image is supposed to turn white and snap to the edge, it doesn‚Äôt do that. Instead, what it does is snap to random parts without the edge of the image on the edge of the format. I hope you fix this soon, cause I have a video I‚Äôd like to finish without any of these issues. Thanks! Take care. Edit: An update came and now CapCut is now harder to use. I was expecting the problem to be fixed but no. No only was the problem not fixed but it would lock up itself and force me to restart the app.

title: Lovely editing app!
text:
I use this to make gacha content everyday and it‚Äôs so easy to use. I was an original KineMaster user, and thought that it was the superior app. When my sister downloaded this app, I was extremely salty and refused to use CapCut and only thought of it poorly. KineMaster got an update and I was a little disappointed with the new KineMaster, I tried out this app, and wow! It is great. I apologize for roasting this app in a positive KineMaster review. That was like 6 months ago. I love this app and it was the best app choice I ever went with when it comes to actually editing. Please note that KineMaster is my #1 app, but I only really use KineMaster for tweening. 
Thank you for (hopefully) reading this through! 
Love ya, see ya, bye!

title: Amazing

I watch my CapCut edits anytime in sad and I feel better. There is something incredible about this app. I love it so much. I also get to express my feelings without anyone being able to see. (Also those who download it, use CapCut templates and find one and add pictures of someone you love and go back and watch it when you need)

title: Amazing, but I have suggestions
text: I‚Äôve been using this for months and I‚Äôve almost mastered this app, I love it. This app has features that other apps make you pay for. There‚Äôs no premium, it‚Äôs all free which is crazy because it feels like a premium version of an app. While this app is amazing there are a few things they should add. 1; the ability to merge text/overlays with the video, this would mean if you merged them effects would apply to them, same with adjustments and movements to the original video. 2; The ability to toggle motion blur on/off for text and overlays, which means when they move (with keyframes or animations) it has motion blur, and would be much smoother/professional looking. Otherwise this app is all I need, thanks!

title: I love the app, but‚Ä¶
text:
I really liked this app. It was so fun, easy to learn, and was easy to make videos on! I have used this app ever since December of 2020, and I still use it. title: Best Editing App By Far
text: I love CapCut. I very rarely leave ratings or comments, but this app is highly worth it! It's an incredible video editing app that offers a wide range of features and tools for creating amazing videos. The user interface is intuitive and easy to navigate, making it perfect for both beginners and experienced editors. The app provides various editing options, from adding filters and effects to trimming and merging clips. I appreciate how it allows me to customize my videos with text, stickers, and music. CapCut has definitely become my go-to editing app, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking to enhance their video editing skills.

title: CapCut Review
text: It‚Äôs free. I think yes it could have changes to make it better but with all the features that are already there I think those would cost money. We could have better editing for a smaller price. Just my opinion really good app overall!

title: Best free editing app
text: I love editing and CapCut has made it easy to do so! I use graphs all the time and I have an idea about what you can add to it. So as you know, there are preset graphs, and custom graphs. I use the custom graphs all the time, and I use the same one for most of my edits. I have to go into the graphs and remake the same one over and over again. I think it would be nice to be able to save, and rename your custom graphs if you want to. So no matter what edit, you have the option to click on your saved custom graph to apply it to the keyframes. Same thing with the custom speeds. I hope this can come to CapCut sometime, it would be really helpful! Thank you!

title: Speed bug/glitch.
text:
Hello there creators, hear me out.
I‚Äôve been using capcut for almost a year now and I definitely would recommend it to someone that are novice to editing. I know that u creators are working really hard on capcut to give us the best and let us experience a great time with capcut. The reason why I‚Äôm giving this a 1 star is because of a glitch or bug when changing the speed ‚Äúnormal section‚Äù. Whenever I try to change the speed using the ‚Äúcircle‚Äù it doesn‚Äôt let me. Whenever I drag the circle to a certain speed, it just gives me a different and totally random speed. This is really really annoying, at first I thought maybe I should delete the app and reinstall but I did multiple times and it‚Äôs still the same. Please, fix this bug. I use an IPad 8th generation. 
I would give this a 5 star as soon as it‚Äôs fixed. Otherwise, I‚Äôm moving to another editing app.
Thank, 
Ryan.

title: Good for a free app
text: Cap is a very good editing app from beginners, CapCut was the first editing app I used (I started using it in June of 2021), it‚Äôs very easy to use and locate the things on the app. I just got the new update and the added graphs!!! Honestly the key frames are pretty annoying but they work. The motion blur is more of a direction blurry but they do have a transition called then and now which is sort of motion blur. The slomo is awful and there is no good shake‚Ä¶ the text is fine, but I wish you could use a loop animation and a in and out one at the same time. A lot of the issues would be small fixes/changes to the app but would make a HUGE difference. Over all the app is very good for a free app with NO watermark. I actually LOVE this app I would just love to see changes in the future to make it better.

title: Why does it trim the video?
text: So I‚Äôve been using this since I‚Äôve started editing, I heard of it on TikTok and decided to try it out. It works really nice, this is the easiest app to manage out of all the others I‚Äôve tried like vllo, video star, and inshot (for me anyway). The only issue I found that kind of made me want to use another app is the fact that I made a video that was 43 seconds long (for TikTok) but when I exported it into my camera roll it only said 42 seconds. Why is this? I tried editing my video, making it shorter and then longer, deleting my other projects, etc but nothing seemed to fix the problem that when exported into my camera roll it slowed my video down by one second, therefore the transitions were slowed. Can someone help please? Thank you.

title: Very versatile for a freemium editor packing many features
text:
I nevr thought that the parent company that gave us TikTok would also create quite a compelling multi-platform video editing software which has definitely turned heads and quite social-media focused with manyof the essential/trendy types of effects/transitions. 

It looks quite easy to pick up and learn that one could potentially make a pro-level video with it; none would be wiser to know the truth and they'd be shocked to see it (positively). 

Having used this app for some projects, I tend to think of some content being social focused that this app comes to mind. Plus being available across web and even Windows makes it nearly multi-platform.

title: I love this app, but I could love it even more!
text: Capcut is one of the best phone editing apps out there in my opinion! It‚Äôs perfect for making instagram edits or any type of video, but there are some things that could be added to make this app even more better and useable. I would like to see more masking options and shapes for the masking tool, and more transitions that are subtle but also very smooth. Transitions for the cubes that are simple like going up and down/or side to side would be nice as well! Capcut has so much potential, it just needs more added to its already great platform! I would love to see more filters, but mostly more transitions and masking options! Thank you for reading my review hopefully if the developers see this they consider my request.

title: Best Video Editing Software
text: Started to use this on my phone but once I found out they made a desktop version of this, I immediately installed it. This is one of the best video editing software out there and very user friendly. I use Adobe products all the time, especially for video editing, but CapCut is perfect for making Reels. What makes my Reels pop not only for personal use but even for professional use for my clients are the transitions. The transitions they provide on here are incredible and adds a special element that will make you stand out amongst the rest. Highly recommend for quick video edits, especially for social media.

title: I RECOMMEND IT!
text: I love this app so much! The templets are great the editing is great and pretty much everything about this is great üòç I do have one single thing I don‚Äôt like‚Ä¶.THE COMMENT LIMIT!! ok so the comment break for like 5-10 minutes is fine with me but the ‚Äúdaily limit‚Äù is bull crap I do role plays with my friends in the chats and when we get our daily limits we get angry lol I don‚Äôt understand why there is a daily limit for the comments and I don‚Äôt like it one bit but if you could pls fix this I know my friends, other CapCut users, and I would be a lot more happy with the experience if there is a reason for the daily limit please tell me so I can understand‚Ä¶. Thanks for reading this and considering changing this!ü´∂üèªü´∂üèªü´∂üèª

title: STUPID STUPID APP
text: I used this  stupid app I used for almost 2 years and finally decided to apply for CapCut creator. I sent in my video and waited for almost 2 months. I login to CapCut one day to find I‚Äôve been ‚Äúsigned out‚Äù and I signed back in and had a whole new account. All my liked videos were gone and they wasted 2 whole months of my time. I finally sent in another because this really would be important for me and I‚Äôve waited for a month now and my account was SIGNED OUT AGAIN!!?? I Don‚Äôt KNOW WHY? I DONT SAY ANYTHING BAD IN THE COMMENTSDon‚Äôt  DOWNLOAD THIS STUPID APP IT TAKES SOMETHING YIU CARE ABOUT AND TAKES YOUR TIME AWAY FROM YOUR LIFE! I hate you CapCut. Please if you read all this, don‚Äôt download it breaks your heart! And CapCut fix this stupid bug for others but I won‚Äôt use this app AGAIN!!

title: 4 stars for a reason read more to find out
text:

title: What I Think of CapCut
text: I love CapCut and I‚Äôve been using it for a while, and I don‚Äôt even have TikTok. It‚Äôs great to explore all of the things to do and show it to my family. I also like that I can save the videos to my camera roll. One thing I don‚Äôt like is that is that you can‚Äôt access your projects if you don‚Äôt have internet connection. Right now, I‚Äôm in a different state than I live in, and the hotel internet network doesn‚Äôt let me access most things on my iPad. I tried to access the projects I was currently working on, and it said that I had to free up storage space and I deleted 36 photos. It still said that I had to free up more storage space so I had to delete CapCut and re-download it. Please fix that.

title: I love this app ngl
text: Okay so basically CapCut is a good starter for new editors in all but at times it can get confusing, glitchy, etc but other than that happening I think CapCut is a pretty good editing app for anything that you wanna create. Like tiktok, CapCut also has a page where you can scroll and use templates other known as the ‚Äòtemplates‚Äô page. You can create a profile and several more things with CapCut. Like my mom says, do what you think is best for yourself, tbh in my opinion I think CapCut is best for me because videostar is too hard to use, alight motion is fun but it get boring, and more editing apps like that. Thank you for reading my review! And trust me CapCut is a really good app to use.

title: Great app but üò°üò°
text: So today I was editing my new Music video which had a voiceover well the music played so I had a big screaming part because it was scary and I screamed in it but the scream was in a voice so I decided to put auto captions because I thought it looked cool but apparently in the screening part it decided to auto caption of that and you won‚Äôt believe what it said right when the screen part came there were words underneath the screen part on the screen that said shut up so either it was just a glitch in the game just broke shut up or the game actually wanted me to shut up at that screaming part very disrespectful CapCut but this game is a great game I love it

title: One of the Best
text: I‚Äôve used a bunch of different iPhone editing apps, and CapCut is by FAR the best. For one, everything is free. For two, it‚Äôs fast and efficient, and saves in great quality. There are numerous options, and you can do things that look highly advanced‚Äîit has many of the same features as professional editors such as Adobe Premiere! Personally, I used CapCut when I want to make a good looking edit that won‚Äôt take too much time. For what it is, it‚Äôs such an excellent program. Every time it updates, it‚Äôs something that users have been requesting, and right now it‚Äôs really at its peak. I cannot that the developers enough for such a fantastic program!

title: I love this app, but there is something that needs to be fixed for character editors
text:
This app is awesome and I use it to edit all of the characters I have. It is easy to use and supports many apps. I love the easy key frame usage and everything else about it. The only thing I don‚Äôt like about it is that you can only use 5 overlays. 

The reason this is a big problem is when I save it and transfer it to another draft I can‚Äôt fix any issues that I notice later on and I have to go way back to the other videos to fix it.

 I would be so grateful if you could add other overlays, that is the only thing that I can find wrong w/ the app. Please fix this so I can make better edits. Thank you and goodbye. ü•≤

title: Please solve this issue
text: The app is great and all the overlays and the effects and everything like audio speed and stuff like that worked all fine for awhile until I came across a bug or issue that I would really hope to be fixed asap. It always says I have a connection issue when I add like fonts for texts and audios and speed I was trying to make an edit and I‚Äôve refreshed it several times and even deleted the app a few times and I still have the same issues and I know its not my Wi-Fi or data because all my other apps work its just CapCut please fix this asap because I would like to finish an edit for my dads birthday which is next month on the 27th please fix this thank you!üíó
